message.body: Haha I just want to warn you that I once again woke up w 6 bites on my arm lol in a row and three on middle and two on other arm BUT I put on the mattress cover and I'll give it some more time/reclean everything
I don't want you to think I'm insane , but you told me i should tell you right away which is why I am...it was fine for awhile tho!?
I'm fine sleeping there and just put mattress cover on yesterday and also just bought bed to lift mattress from floor/walls
Hopefully it's nothing
It's not a rash I swear
It's 6 bites in a row. Quite distinct lol
Maybe I'm just super sensitive I dunno
Alex gave me some bug spray and like I said, I'm def sleeping there but just heads up in case it gets worse and worse again lol
God I'm sorry btw
This house =so much stress for you this week lol
￼Better pic of arm
(But have bites on back and some on legs too but not as bad as before lol
And def from night. And I don't hang out on porch or anything I swear
I don't think you are crazy I think you are being incredibly patient & understanding through what has to be a really horrible experience.
Please call Cindy & see what her thoughts are. I wish Beth was around. Cindy seems competent but Beth is incredible. Have you spoke to her?
Ok, I'll call and see
I feel like ..the cover and stuff is an important step
I didn't so the steps correctly
*do
So maybe now that it's covered and I do my Clothes maybe redusting is worth it?
I dunno ok I'll call her
So far it's bearable (before, I woke up at night bc of all the new bites) but just wanted to give you heads up in case it gets worse
I showed them to Alex And she once again has no bites
Lol I'm the only one sensitive enough to react
#lucky
Actually why don't you call Beth. She is a really cool & a complete expert. Tell her everything & see what she thinks. I think she is an out of the boxer thinker.
Ok!
Could I have Beth's number again? Got more bites last night :/
Ok Beth is out of the picture she says bc of her knee
I'll call Cindy again
